Title: Relates to enacting the "handgun trigger safety act"
Summary: Enacts the "handgun trigger safety act" which creates a fund to develop personalized handgun technology; requires that all handguns manufactured in the state of New York have personalized handgun technology within five years and all handguns be retrofitted within ten years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to enacting the "handgun trigger safety act"
